organization_profile.goal: Improve Customer Experience and Operational Efficiency

recommendations: Enhance the Chatbot for Improved Accuracy and Proactive Customer Service.
Explore AI-Driven Personalization for Product Recommendations and Marketing.
Analyze Customer Data for Inventory Optimization and Demand Forecasting.

investment.opex: ₹140,000 - ₹240,000 (Includes AI solution costs, data analysis, and personnel)

roles.name: AI Engineer/Data Scientist (Contractor/Part-time)
roles.credentials: Experience in NLP and Recommendation Systems

roles.name: Data Analyst (FTE or Contractor)
roles.credentials: Experience in E-commerce Analytics and SQL

milestones.name: Chatbot Accuracy Improved (Phase 1)
dependencies: Data labeling and Model training complete

risk_register.name: Chatbot Inaccuracies
risk_register.mitigation: Regularly review and retrain the chatbot with new data, user feedback

risk_register.name: Data Privacy Compliance
risk_register.mitigation: Conduct regular audits and adhere to e-commerce data protection guidelines

business: Reduced customer service load (e.g., 15% decrease in support tickets)

training.plan: Workshops for Customer Service and Marketing teams.

goals: Enhance existing chatbot using improved NLP models
Integrate recommendation engine with existing e-commerce platform
tools: Cloud-based NLP services (e.g., Dialogflow, Rasa) and recommendation engines

long_term.goal: Implement predictive analytics for inventory optimization

longtermstrategy.scaling_trigger: Sustained improvements in conversion rates and customer satisfaction.
longtermstrategy.innovation_pipeline: Participate in AI workshops and conferences to stay current with emerging trends.
